solution_line_template: 2 of her lambs had 2 babies each so that adds {num_lambs_had_babies}*{babies_per_lamb} = <<{num_lambs_had_babies}*{babies_per_lamb}={baby_lambs}>>{baby_lambs} lambs
She starts with {initial_lambs} and adds {baby_lambs} baby lambs so she had {initial_lambs}+{baby_lambs} = <<{initial_lambs}+{baby_lambs}={after_babies}>>{after_babies} lambs
She traded {lambs_traded} of those lambs for a goat so she has {after_babies}-{lambs_traded} =<<{after_babies}-{lambs_traded}={after_trade}>>{after_trade} lambs

She has {after_trade} and woke up to find {extra_lambs_found} more lambs in the field so she has a total of {after_trade}+{extra_lambs_found} = <<{after_trade}+{extra_lambs_found}={total_lambs}>>{total_lambs} lambs
